(#{item.orderNo}, #{item.merchantNo}, #{item.cardNo}, #{item.submitTime}, '100', #{item.returnAmount}, #{item.transTime}, NULL, #{item.orderStatus}, NULL, NULL, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, '1')

MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
